--- title: basic_nbdev module keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A basic library developed using nbdev" ---

This is the README section of the basic_nbdev library.

Install¶

pip install basic_nbdev

How to use¶

The only function available in basic_nbdev library is print_info. It is just a print function. LOL!

print_info("Hey There")

'You just type Hey There from your own keyboard'
print_info("Bye")

'You just type Bye from your own keyboard'
